posts.post_title: FS: T222 of Archer, Chalmers, Keating & Saier
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Peich
Upgrading my set and have these four for sale:
Archer SGC 20
Chalmers SGC A
Keating SGC 10 (very scarce high number)
Saier SGC 10.

Make an offer for the four, and scans are available by emailing me: mpeich@comcast.net. 

Thanks for looking, Mike
